content: Myleene Klass looked glamorous in a white floral maxi dress as she arrived at Global FM for her radio show on Monday.

The presenter, 45, looked stunning in the V-neck number which boasted a ruffled neckline as she stepped out after her hosting stint for King Charles' Coronation on Saturday. She kept comfy in a pair of pastel pink Chanel sandals and toted her belongings in a turquoise bag. The I'm A Celebrity star accessorised with a pair of hoop earrings and layered several gold necklaces. Myleene completed her daytime ensemble with a pair of eye-catching blue framed sunglasses and styled her long brunette tresses loose.

The appearance comes after Myleene presented live on ITV for King Charles' historic Coronation on Saturday.The giddy presenter had been made ITV's prime Music Expert and joined the channel live from the ceremony.The broadcaster looked nothing short of sensational as she took to Instagram to share snaps from her hosting gig.She looked incredible in a pink crochet midi dress from her collection with Next as she posed up a storm with an ITV umbrella during the rainy ceremony.To finish off the look, Myleene elevated her height with a pair of gold platform heels and donned a few layered gold necklaces to accessorise.She also styled her short brunette locks in a straight bob to work at the historic occasion.Taking to Instagram, she wrote: 'And that's a wrap. What an incredible, historic moment to be a part of. Thank you for watching @itv #Coronation dress @nextofficial #MyleeneKlassXNext.'
